# CPInformationRatingItem

**Class**

A data object that provides rated content for an information template.

## Declaration

```swift
class CPInformationRatingItem
```

## Overview

`CPInformationRatingItem` provides the ability to display rated content in the rows of an information template. Depending on the template’s layout, the item’s attributes stack vertically or horizontally in the rows. The [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPInformationItem/title] property describes the content, and the [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPInformationItem/detail] property provides the content. Use the [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPInformationRatingItem/rating] and [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPInformationRatingItem/maximumRating] properties to display a rating for the content. For example, you could show a service rating when displaying information about a restaurant or café.

The template manages the visual styling of the rating and maximum rating.

## Creating a Rating Item

- **init(rating:maximumRating:title:detail:)**: Creates a rating item with a current and a maximum rating.

## Accessing the Item’s Attributes

- **rating**: The current rating that the template displays.
- **maximumRating**: The maximum rating that the template displays.

## Managing the Items

- **items**: The items that the template displays.
- **CPInformationItem**: A data object that provides content for an information template.

## Inherits From

- CPInformationItem

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
